name: Sonoma County Library eLibrary
description: Free digital resources including ebooks, audiobooks, databases, and online learning with Sonoma County library card
fullDescription: Sonoma County Library provides free eLibrary resources including ebooks, audiobooks, streaming content, and online learning for all cardholders.
whatTheyOffer:
- Ebooks and audiobooks via Libby
- Streaming movies and music
- Online learning platforms
- Research databases
- Digital magazines
- Homework help resources
howToGetIt:
1. Get a Sonoma County Library card (free for residents)
2. Visit sonomalibrary.org/elibrary
3. Browse available digital resources
4. Sign in with your library card
5. Access content on any device
keywords: Sonoma County Library, Sonoma, eLibrary, digital resources, ebooks, audiobooks, Libby, streaming, homework help, databases
